definition: of this earth or world, the semantic role of the noun phrase that designates the time of the state or action denoted by the verb
details:
adjective
- of this earth or world
= example: of this earth or world
- not eternal
= example: not eternal
- characteristic of or devoted to the temporal world as opposed to the spiritual world
= synonyms: secular
- of or relating to the temples (the sides of the skull behind the orbit)
= example: of or relating to the temples (the sides of the skull behind the orbit)
- of or relating to or limited by time
= example: of or relating to or limited by time
noun
- the semantic role of the noun phrase that designates the time of the state or action denoted by the verb
= synonyms: temporal role
